project.title: ShareHub
project.detail: ShareHub is an English article and image sharing platform that enables users to effortlessly share and explore interesting content.
content: Built with Vue 3, Vite, Element Plus, and Tailwind CSS
Designed for internal use within an English-speaking community in the company, with an estimated user base of approximately 30-50 users

project.title: NUK International Student Application System
project.detail: Designed for international students and administrative staff. The system facilitates online applications and provides comprehensive front-end and back-end functionalities to streamline the application process.
content: Built with PHP, Native JavaScript(ES5) and MySQL
Front-end: Empowering international students to apply to NUK by enabling document uploads, data entry, material downloads, and application progress tracking
Back-end: Facilitating administrative staff at the international affairs office with tools for reviewing student submissions, conducting evaluations, and updating documents from the front-end
